means: 小于原子的，亚原子的，次原子的

word_mean: 亚原子的：存在于原子内的原子构成部分的

sentence.Network_en: Subatomic physics deals with all entities smaller than the atom.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚原子物理学研究一切小于原子的客体.

sentence.Network_en: Subatomic physics involves the creation and destruction of particles.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚原子物理学涉及到粒子的产生和湮灭.

sentence.Network_en: Time reversal invariance is a very useful symmetry in subatomic physics.
sentence.Network_cn: 时间反演不变性在亚原子物理中仍然是一种很有用的对称性.

所谓的「内在宇宙」，其实就是次原子（subatomic）的世界。在这个世界中，成员包括了原子核以及其组成的成分，也就是建构物质 …

list.abs: “希格斯玻色子”理论由英国爱丁堡大学物理学家希格斯于1964年提出，玻色子是一种“次原子粒子”(subatomic particle)，即比原子还小 …
这套理论适用于亚原子粒子（subatomic particle）的世界，但对于我们的人生和事业也同样准确。总之，《答案》要向你说明，如何 …

entry.tran: 亚原子的;次原子的;原子内的
entry.def: A subatomic particle is a particle which is part of an atom, for example an electron, a proton, or a neutron.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to constituents of the atom or forces within the atom;
2. of dimensions smaller than atomic dimensions

auth_sentence.content: Quantum mechanics describes phenomena at the subatomic level.
auth_sentence.res_content: Quantum mechanics describes phenomena at the subatomic level.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Quantum mechanics describes phenomena at the subatomic level.

auth_sentence.content: Extrapolating from indeterminacy at the subatomic level is hardly conclusive.
auth_sentence.res_content: Extrapolating from indeterminacy at the subatomic level is hardly conclusive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Extrapolating from indeterminacy at the subatomic level is hardly conclusive.

auth_sentence.content: QM treats subatomic relativistic events as a probability wave motion.

Sentence.sentence: Later working together in London, they laid the foundations of modern physics by showing that normal laws of cause and effect do not apply at the level of subatomic particles.
Finding the true nature of subatomic particles
